DDL.CREATECLIENT: CREATE TABLE CLIENT (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, NAME VARCHAR(300), CNPJ VARCHAR(30), SEGMENT VARCHAR(100), BIRTHDATE DATETIME, CREATIONDATE DATETIME)
DDL.CREATEPRODUCT: CREATE TABLE PRODUCT (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, NAME VARCHAR(300), CREATIONDATE DATETIME)
DDL.CREATECLIENTPRODUCT: CREATE TABLE CLIENT_PRODUCT (IDCLIENT INT, IDPRODUCT INT, CREATIONDATE DATETIME)
